name: Flappy Bird 2.0 (Bussuf)
description:
Flappy Bird 2.0

Welcome to Flappy Bird 2.0, the ultimate Flappy Bird clone! In this fast-paced 2D pixel art game, you'll take control of a clumsy bird (or burger) as you navigate through a series of obstacles, trying to fly as far as you can without crashing.

With intuitive one-button controls and challenging gameplay, Flappy Bird 2.0 will keep you coming back for more. As you progress through the levels, the obstacles become increasingly difficult to avoid, requiring quick reflexes and precise timing. Each time you play, you'll discover new challenges and obstacles that will keep you on your toes.

In addition to the addictive gameplay, Flappy Bird 2.0 features charming pixel art graphics and a catchy chiptune soundtrack that will have you humming along as you play. With multiple characters, obstacles and themes it's always fun to get a new high score. So why wait? Start flapping and see how far you can fly in Flappy Bird 2.0!

----------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

SPACE or Click to flap

----------------------------------------------

PRO TIPS:

Get a score over 50 to win a gold medal.
